Rich Collins wrote:

> It appears that Heritrix does not use the system host file
> (/etc/hosts).  Is this correct?

Heritrix uses the dnsjava library to do its lookups.  See 'Limitations' 
section in http://www.xbill.org/dnsjava/README for description of how it 
goes about its business on the different platforms.
St.Ack
